meanings.definition: A person who is opposed to smoking.
meanings.sent1: The antismoker campaigned for smoke-free public spaces.
meanings.sent2: My friend is an antismoker and always reminds us of the dangers of smoking.
meanings.sent3: The antismoker joked that they would rather eat broccoli than inhale cigarette smoke.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like an antismoker in a room full of smokers.
meanings.sent5: The antismoker's passion for clean air was contagious.

meanings.sent1: The antismoker group organized a protest outside the tobacco company.
meanings.sent2: Her antismoker views made her unpopular at the cigar lounge.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave the antismoker glare when it smelled cigarette smoke.
meanings.sent4: The antismoker policy swept through the office like a fresh breeze.
meanings.sent5: His antismoker attitude was evident in the way he wrinkled his nose at the smell of smoke.
